response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,000,000 to you, and we believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $900,000. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this unique acquisition.", "product_price": 900000}
